keyMoments.title: Discovers Mirror Shard
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers a piece of mirror stuck in his afro from his earlier visit to Foxy's room, providing him with a tool to counter the Noro Noro Beam.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's resourcefulness and ability to adapt during combat.

keyMoments.title: Reflects Noro Noro Beam
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses the mirror shard to reflect Foxy's Noro Noro Beam back at him, turning his own Devil Fruit power against him.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases tactical thinking and exploitation of enemy weaknesses.
keyMoments.quote: Your beam won't work on me anymore!

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Flail Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Flail technique, spinning his arm in a circle before driving his fist into Foxy while he's slowed.
keyMoments.significance: Adds a new technique to Luffy's combat arsenal, combining his Devil Fruit powers with Foxy's slowness effect for a devastating blow.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Foxy
keyMoments.description: Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Flail sends Foxy flying out of bounds, securing victory and ending Foxy's 920-win streak in Davy Back Fights.
keyMoments.significance: Concludes the Davy Back Fight arc and establishes Luffy's victory over a veteran pirate.

keyMoments.title: Reclaims Crew Members
keyMoments.description: Luffy reclaims Chopper and Robin from the Foxy Pirates, reuniting his crew after the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Restores the Straw Hat Pirates to their full roster.

abilities.description: Luffy swings one arm in a circle at high speed, then drives his fist into his opponent with accumulated force.

reveals.information: First use of Gomu Gomu no Flail technique

keyMoments.title: Noro Noro Beam Reflected
keyMoments.description: Foxy's Noro Noro Beam is reflected back at him by Luffy using a mirror, turning his own Devil Fruit power against him.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the critical weakness of the Noro Noro no Mi.

keyMoments.title: First Loss - 920-Win Streak Ends
keyMoments.description: Foxy is knocked out of bounds by Luffy's Gomu Gomu no Flail and loses the Davy Back Fight, ending his legendary 920-game winning streak.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of Foxy's undefeated record and demonstrates the limits of relying solely on Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Noro Noro Beam can be reflected by mirrors
920-game winning streak in Davy Back Fights ends

keyMoments.title: Rittonto's Arrival
keyMoments.description: Rittonto arrives on a giant mole, emerging from underground to reunite with his grandfather Tonjit after ten years of separation.
keyMoments.significance: Anime-only character debut that provides closure to Tonjit's storyline.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Tonjit
keyMoments.description: Rittonto tearfully embraces his grandfather and shares how he became the world's best hole-digger to cope with loneliness and find his way back.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional resolution to the separation storyline and demonstrates themes of perseverance and family bonds.

abilities.description: Rittonto is the world's best hole digger, able to dig considerable distances underground with his trained mole.

relationships.description: Rittonto is Tonjit's grandson, separated for ten years before their emotional reunion.

evolutionMoments.description: Rittonto reunites with his grandfather after ten years, having become a champion hole-digger to find him.

reveals.information: Revealed to be Tonjit's grandson and the world's best hole digger
Became a hole-digger to cope with loneliness after being separated from his grandfather

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Reclaimed by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Chopper is reclaimed by Luffy from the Foxy Pirates after Luffy's victory in the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites with the Straw Hat Pirates after being temporarily taken by Foxy.

keyMoments.title: Reclaimed by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Robin is reclaimed by Luffy from the Foxy Pirates after Luffy's victory in the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Reunites with the Straw Hat Pirates after being temporarily taken by Foxy.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Grandson
keyMoments.description: Tonjit tearfully reunites with his grandson Rittonto after ten years of separation.
keyMoments.significance: Provides closure to Tonjit's storyline and demonstrates themes of family bonds.

relationships.description: Tonjit is Rittonto's grandfather, reunited after ten years of separation.

evolutionMoments.description: Tonjit reunites with his grandson Rittonto after being separated for ten years.
